Class ADLXMultimediaServicesHelper

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Wrapper over IADLXMultimediaServices exposing managed/native accessors and change handling.

public sealed class ADLXMultimediaServicesHelper : IDisposable
